text: Sace kho pana karoto na karīyati pāpaṃ athāhaṃ ubhayeneva visuddhaṃ attānaṃ samanupassāmī ti ayamassa catuttho assāso adhigato hoti
edit: Sace kho pana karoto na karīyati pāpaṃ athāhaṃ ubhayeneva visuddhaṃ attānaṃ samanupassāmī ti ayamassa catuttho assāso adhigato hoti

translations.transtext: (4) If when [a person] is doing [an evil action], the evil action is not done, then I see myself flawless by both sides. This is the fourth obtained consolation.
